Title: Relates to the restrictions on consecutive hours of work for nurses
Summary: Assesses an employer a civil penalty of not less than one thousand nor more than ten thousand dollars, per violation where an employer requires a nurse to work more than such nurse's regularly scheduled work hours; further provides that the employee shall receive an additional fifteen percent of the overtime payment from the employer for each violation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the restrictions on consecutive hours of work for nurses
